title: Over 3-hour power cuts during weekend
body_lines: Electricity regulator the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) has given approval to the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) to enforce a three hour and 20 minute power cut for the weekend.
Areas A to L will experience a two-hour power disruption between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m. and a one hour and 20 minute disruption from 5 p.m. to 10 p.m.
Areas P to W will face a two-hour power disruption between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m., and a one hour and 20 minute disruption from 5 p.m. to 10 p.m.
